originalText.text: Dr. Chan is the best doctor I have worked with hands down. She is attentive, truly takes time with her patients, and goes above and beyond to help.

text.text: Dr. Chan is the best doctor I have worked with hands down. She is attentive, truly takes time with her patients, and goes above and beyond to help.

originalText.text: I was new to the area and was pleasantly surprised to find Dr. Chan who had an office directly across from my complex on River Road in New Jersey. She is wonderful, punctual, attentive, meticulous about your overall health and medical history and has a fantastic staff who treat you cordially and compassionately. I love her! She treated me like family from the first visit. She has always been immediately available, makes personal phone calls to you when an important concern arises, and always manages to fit you in, even when her schedule may be heavily booked. She has masterfully handled my total care with continuity which was especially critical because it was her referral that saved my life! When I went for my routine colonoscopy they found a very large tumor that was cancer and I ended up with an emergency resection. Now Dr. Chan is overseeing all of my critical labs, pathology, specialist referrals, and total wellness program with efficiency, compassion and my overall life situation in mind. This is a rare combination of genuine talent and God given insights. I trust her with my life! I have also referred my young adult daughter to her who works in NYC and has some delicate health concerns which have been mounting for over five years and only Dr. Chan has seemed to immediately grasp, treat and resolve. I am most grateful to Dr. Chan for being one of the finest physicians I have ever known. She is highly trained and a true physician of care, compassion and excellence!

originalText.text: Dr. Chan is great, she is very attentive and patient and makes sure you feel comfortable. I have had as a doctor for numerous years and location and I highly recommend her.

originalText.text: Dr. Chan is one of the nicest doctors I have ever been to. Her and her staff are quick yet very thorough. Going to try and book an appt with her today. Shes superb!

text.text: Dr. Chan is one of the nicest doctors I have ever been to. Her and her staff are quick yet very thorough. Going to try and book an appt with her today. Shes superb!

originalText.text: Have been seeing Dr Chan since 2013 and would not switch Drs for anything. Appointments are very easy to schedule, the staff is very friendly and the doctor is very knowledgable. I would recommend making her your PCP.
